page.title: 03Events in Stallingborough
page.content: Church and Chapel special services eg. Carol Concerts, Harvest Festivals, Christmas Fayre, Garden Parties. Womens' Institute - Produce Show. Competitions for villagers in vegetables, crafts cookery, flower arranging etc. Harvest Supper. Jumble Sale - selling anything second-hand. Coffee Mornings - One is held in aid of Cancer Research, also Clubs hold them for funds.Blind Sale - The Blind Guild bring work to the village once a year. Goods are made by blind and handicapped. Sunday School Outing - Yearly, this is free to members, although villagers join them at the seaside. Day Trips - old peoples outings are held during the summer. Football and Cricket Clubs both hold presentation Dances. Carol Singers go round the village and outlying houses.
